mapper.select: SELECT u.id,sh.tjshl,sh.hj,sh.shfxz,p.shp_tp,s.sku_mch,s.kc from t_mall_shoppingCar sh,t_user u, t_mall_product p,t_mall_sku s where sh.yh_id = u.id and sh.shp_id = p.Id and sh.sku_id = s.Id
SELECT s.kc from t_mall_shoppingCar sh,t_mall_sku s WHERE sh.sku_id = s.Id and and sh.sku_id = #{sku_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_mall_shoppingCar sh,t_mall_sku s set s.kc = s.kc - #{tjsl} where sh.sku_id = s.Id and sh.sku_id = #{sku_id}
